name: FMeshReductionSettings
doc: Settings used to reduce a mesh.

PercentTriangles: Percentage of triangles to keep. 1.0 = no reduction, 0.0 = no triangles. (Triangles criterion properties)
MaxNumOfTriangles: The maximum number of triangles to retain when using percentage termination criterion. (Triangles criterion properties)
PercentVertices: Percentage of vertices to keep. 1.0 = no reduction, 0.0 = no vertices. (Vertices criterion properties)
MaxNumOfVerts: The maximum number of vertices to retain when using percentage termination criterion. (Vertices criterion properties)
MaxDeviation: The maximum distance in object space by which the reduced mesh may deviate from the original mesh.
PixelError: The amount of error in pixels allowed for this LOD.
WeldingThreshold: Threshold in object space at which vertices are welded together.
HardAngleThreshold: Angle at which a hard edge is introduced between faces.
SilhouetteImportance: Higher values minimize change to border edges.
ShadingImportance: Higher values try to preserve normals better.
TerminationCriterion: The method to use when optimizing static mesh LODs
VertexColorImportance: Higher values minimize change to vertex color data.
